**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 207 2.0 **Requirements** The badger isn’t [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) or raging. --- The badger enters a state of pure rage that lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies it can perceive, or until it falls [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38), whichever comes first. It can't voluntarily stop raging. While raging, the badger is affected in the following ways.
  • It deals 4 additional damage with its bite attacks and 2 additional damage with its claw attacks.
  • It takes a –1 penalty to AC.
  • It can't use actions that have the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait. The animal companion can [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) even while raging.
After it has stopped raging, it can't use Badger Rage again for 1 minute.
name: Badger Rage
requirement: The badger isn’t  fatigued  or raging.
